on reading compounds: 急【キュウ】sudden, abrupt, unexpected, urgent, pressing, steep, sharp, precipitous, rapid, swift, fast, emergency, crisis, danger, urgency, hurrying, haste, (in gagaku or noh) end of a song
急遽【キュウキョ】hurriedly, in a hurry, in haste, sudden
準急【ジュンキュウ】semi-express train, local express train, sub-express train, slower than an express (more stops)
警急【ケイキュウ】alarm, emergency, sudden contingency, alert
kun reading compounds: 急ぐ【いそぐ】to hurry, to rush, to hasten, to make something happen sooner
急ぎ【いそぎ】haste, hurry, expedition, speed, dispatch
急ぎ足【いそぎあし】fast pace, quick pace
急く【せく】to hurry, to rush
